mapper.select: select a.attend_no, b.name, c.code_name, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.special_note,a.code_no from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no inner join tb_code c on a.code_no = c.code_no and a.attend_reg_date>date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select a.attend_no, b.name, c.code_name, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.special_note,a.code_no from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no inner join tb_code c on a.code_no = c.code_no
and a.attend_reg_date like concat(#{attendRegDate},'%')
